titleInfo.title: [{Mo-VI(8)V-IV(4)O-36(V-VO4)(V-IVO)(2)}(n)](7n-): capped alpha-Keggin fragments linked to a chain

mods.abstract: The synthesis and single-crystal X-ray structure analysis of the unusual Mo/V polyoxometalate compound Na0.5K6.5[Mo(VI)8V(IV)4(O)36((VO4)-O-V)((VO)-O-IV)(2)]. 12.5H(2)O which contains capped alpha-Keggin fragments linked to a chain is reported; this chain is an interesting object for magnetochemists and can be considered to consist of an assembly of electron storage units.
